heading: Decentralized Nature of Wakanda
content: As a decentralized platform, Wakanda has limited access to user information.
However, your betting-related activities on-chain are visible to Wakanda.

heading: Collection of Information
content: Betting Activity: Wakanda can view your betting activities on-chain, including transaction history and outcomes.
AML/KYC Data: Only necessary data required for Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and Know Your Customer (KYC) compliance will be recorded and stored.

heading: Use of Information
content: The information collected is strictly used for AML/KYC compliance and to maintain the integrity of our services.
We do not use your data for marketing or any non-compliance-related purposes.

heading: Non-Disclosure of Data
content: We do not and will never sell your data to third parties.

heading: Protection of Minors
content: Wakanda is strictly for users aged 18 and above.
We do not knowingly collect or store data from minors.
Accounts suspected to belong to minors will be terminated immediately.

heading: Data Security
content: We implement reasonable measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, and disclosure.

heading: Transmission of Data
content: Data will only be transmitted if required by a court order or a legal authority.
We will comply with legal obligations while ensuring the minimum necessary data is shared.

heading: Your Rights
content: Users have the right to inquire about the data we hold and to request the deletion of their data, subject to our AML/KYC obligations.

heading: Changes to This Privacy Policy
content: Wakanda reserves the right to update this Privacy Policy.
Changes will be communicated through our platform.

heading: Contact Us
content: For any privacy-related concerns or inquiries, please contact us through the official Wakanda Twitter or Discord community channel.
